branchCategory.name: JXC*1
branchCategory.description: <p>The JXC*1 is a single axis controller for LE's 24VDC step motors compatible with several fieldbus protocols including Ethernet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&trade;</span> fieldbus. Actuator motors can be operated by calling a line of step data or by direct numerical instruction, each possible over the network.  Futher fieldbus compatible functions include return to origin, alarm outputs and resets, parameter setup, status monitoring, and trial runs.</p>
